core_concept: Quantum entanglement is a mysterious connection between two or more particles. It's like they're dancing together in secret, even when they're really far apart. When something happens to one particle, it instantly affects the other, no matter how far away it is.

key_actors_and_components.name: Entangled Particles
key_actors_and_components.description: The particles that are connected through quantum entanglement.

key_actors_and_components.name: Quantum Field
key_actors_and_components.description: A field that allows the entangled particles to connect and communicate with each other.

key_actors_and_components.name: Superposition
key_actors_and_components.description: The state where an entangled particle can exist in multiple states at the same time.

key_actors_and_components.name: Quantum Measurement
key_actors_and_components.description: The process of observing or measuring an entangled particle, which can affect its state and that of other particles in the entanglement.

story_of_process.name: Connection
story_of_process.description: Two or more particles become connected through quantum entanglement. This connection is instantaneous, no matter how far apart they are.

story_of_process.name: Superposition
story_of_process.description: The entangled particles exist in a state of superposition, where each particle can have multiple states at the same time.

story_of_process.name: Measurement
story_of_process.description: One or more particles are measured, which causes their states to become fixed and connected across the entire entanglement.

story_of_process.name: Instant Connection
story_of_process.description: When one particle is measured, it instantly affects the state of other entangled particles, no matter how far away they are.

core_principles.name: Quantum Mechanics
core_principles.description: The branch of physics that studies the behavior of tiny particles and their connections through quantum mechanics.

core_principles.name: Non-Locality
core_principles.description: The phenomenon where two or more particles can be connected in a way that allows them to affect each other instantaneously, regardless of distance.

core_principles.name: Wave-Particle Duality
core_principles.description: The property of quantum particles that can exhibit both wave-like and particle-like behavior.
